Message:
The seed’s still inside me,
but it’s only an empty husk now.

Thanks to that, I was
chased out of the Academy.

But, not long after that,
a guy with a staff approached us.

Apparently when I unleashed
the powers of the seed,
the world outside got kinda crazy,
so he came to help us out.

Still, inside the girl
that’s with him,
there’s almost an
exact replica of...

You’re worried about me
so you wanna come too?

Awww, Serruria,
you really are adorable
when you can’t be honest!

You don’t need to worry.
I’ll always stay by your side.

’Cause...I can only get serious
when it comes to you, Serruria.
